pages.text: Likely the first machine the aspiring witch will obtain, the Witches' Oven can burn certain reagents down to special fumes, and can produce a range of secondary products. If a Witches' Oven is given Clay Jars, it will collect the produced fumes. The jar is only needed if the outpute is a fume.
One of the most vital of all extracts, made from any type of oak sapling
Essence of spruce trees, and vital to the Spinning Wheel
A light and airy fume derived from young birch
A common oil produced from cooking meats and herbs, and often used as a base oil for more advanced fumes
A rather hard to find fume with great powers in healing
A foul oil that reeks of death and decay, derived from the Cypress tree
An extract from Elder trees that is said to imbue knowledge on the user
An extract from mandrakes that just hums with magical energy
A life-giving residue obtained from burned Yew saplings
A green-blue material you can feel resonating with aetheric energy, along with a powerful connection to the Ender.
